channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16732] Transactional tables should block LOAD DATA
item.description:
This has always been the design.

see LoadSemanticAnalyzer.analyzeInternal()
StrictChecks.checkBucketing(conf);

Some examples (this is exposed by HIVE-16177)
insert_values_orig_table.q
insert_orig_table.q
insert_values_orig_table_use_metadata.q
item.summary: Transactional tables should block LOAD DATA

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
The fact that above name test cases "worked" was a fluke.
The LOAD DATA statements just a add a single file to table dir and the system things it's an 'original' file as if the table went through non-acid to acid conversion. The file added 'alltypesorc' is not even named appropriately.
wzheng could you review please?

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12869380/HIVE-16732.01.patch

SUCCESS: +1 due to 1 test(s) being added or modified.

ERROR: -1 due to 6 failed/errored test(s), 10743 tests executed
Failed tests:

org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestCliDriver.testCliDriver[insert_orig_table] (batchId=58)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestCliDriver.testCliDriver[insert_values_orig_table] (batchId=54)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestCliDriver.testCliDriver[insert_values_orig_table_use_metadata] (batchId=60)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver.testCliDriver[insert_orig_table] (batchId=155)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver.testCliDriver[vector_if_expr] (batchId=144)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestNegativeCliDriver.org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestNegativeCliDriver (batchId=89)

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/5391/testReport
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/5391/console
Test logs: http://104.198.109.242/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-Build-5391/

Messages:

Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.TestCheckPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.PrepPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ExecutionPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ReportingPhase
Tests exited with: TestsFailedException: 6 tests failed

This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12869380 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

The 4 failures from
insert_values_orig_table.q
insert_orig_table.q
insert_values_orig_table_use_metadata.q

are expected - this is what this patch addresses. The other 2 are not related.

patch 15 of HIVE-16177 includes changes to the above tests so they don't use this unsupported features
Do you mean that HIVE-15148 disabled loading data into bucketed tables by default, so ACID won't support load data by default, until the bucketing restriction is removed?

Transactional tables never supported loading files (by default or otherwise) into them but it was not enforced. This patch enforces it with a proper exception.
When we allow non-bucketed acid tables we can revisit this.
OK. nit: why is the error code 10500, instead of being grouped together with other ACID error codes? Otherwise +1.

e.g. after this entry, 10266?

  TXNMGR_NOT_ACID(10265, "This command is not allowed on an ACID table {0}.{1} with a non-ACID transaction manager", true),
you're right - I didn't realize there was a gap in the sequence
